description: Residence Permit (Aufenthaltsbewilligung - Studierender) for long-term studies (>6 months). Optimized for the 'Direct Embassy' track (Cheapest/Official).

meta.passport_validity: 3 months beyond validity of the applied permit
meta.photo_spec: 35x45mm, ICAO Standard, Not older than 6 months
meta.min_funds_requirement:
**Strict Age-Based Logic (2025 Rates):**

* **Under 24:** €703.58/month (~€8,443/year)
* **Over 24:** €1,273.99/month (~€15,288/year)
* **The Rent Trap:** This base amount only covers rent up to **€359.72**. If your rent is higher (e.g., €550), you MUST show the difference (€190.28) as extra monthly funds.

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Valid for at least 3 months beyond the intended stay. Must have 2 blank pages. Include copies of all used pages.

documents.title: Application Form (Aufenthaltsbewilligung)
documents.description: Download the 'Antrag auf Erteilung einer Aufenthaltsbewilligung' (Formular). Fill in German/English. Do NOT use the Tourist Visa C form.

documents.title: Admission Letter (Bescheid)
documents.description: Official 'Bescheid' or 'Aufnahmebestätigung' from the Austrian University/FH. Electronic signature is accepted.

documents.title: Apostilled Birth Certificate
documents.description: Original Birth Certificate with MEA Apostille sticker. Mandatory for first-time applicants. English translation required if in regional language.

documents.title: Apostilled PCC
documents.description: Police Clearance Certificate issued by Passport Office (PSK), not older than 3 months, with MEA Apostille.

documents.title: Proof of Accommodation (Mietvertrag)
documents.description: Tenancy agreement or Dormitory contract (OeAD) for at least 3 months. *Warning: Hotel bookings are NOT accepted.*

documents.title: Proof of Solvency
documents.description: Bank statement (last 6 months) showing the full year's amount. Account must be accessible from Austria (e.g., International Debit Card).

documents.title: Travel Health Insurance
documents.description: Coverage of €30,000 for the initial period (3-4 months) until enrollment in Austrian Statutory Insurance (ÖGK).

steps_flow.title: Secure Housing (Critical First Step)
steps_flow.description:
You cannot apply without a fixed address. Go to the OeAD Housing website.
* **Action:** Book a room and pay the deposit.
* **Download:** The signed 'Benützungsvertrag' (Usage Agreement). This is your proof of residence.

steps_flow.title: Document Legalization (Apostille)
steps_flow.description:
Your Indian Birth Certificate and PCC are invalid in Austria without an Apostille.
* **Action:** Register on e-Sanad or visit a BLS Attestation center.
* **Submit:** Original documents + Passport copies.
* **Receive:** Documents with the square MEA sticker on the back (approx 3-5 days).

steps_flow.title: Book Embassy Appointment
steps_flow.description:
Apply directly at the Embassy to avoid confusion. 
* **Action:** Email 'new-delhi-embassy@bmeia.gv.at' (Delhi) or 'mumbai.cg@bmeia.gv.at' (Mumbai).
* **Subject:** 'Residence Permit Student - [Your Name]'.
* **Attach:** Scanned Passport and Admission Letter. Wait for their confirmation email.

steps_flow.title: In-Person Submission
steps_flow.description:
Visit the Embassy/Consulate on your slot.
* **Carry:** All Originals + 2 Sets of Photocopies + €160 fee in CASH (INR equivalent).
* **Process:** Submit files, give fingerprints, and answer interview questions (e.g., 'Why Austria?').

steps_flow.title: Collect Visa D (Entry Visa)
steps_flow.description:
Wait 8-12 weeks for the Magistrate (MA35) approval.
* **Notification:** You will receive an email stating your permit is ready.
* **Action:** Return to the Embassy (or VFS if specifically instructed by email) to submit your passport for the 'Visa D' stamp.
* **Travel:** Enter Austria, then collect your physical Residence Permit card from the local Magistrate.

eligibility.required_education: Admission to an accredited Austrian university or recognised study programme (official admission letter required)

top_universities: University of Natural Resources and Life Sciences, Vienna
Vienna University of Economics and Business
pre_visa_steps: Prepare Your Motivation Letter (Optional but helps)
